Package avahi4j

This is Avahi4J's main package which contains the classes to interact with Avahi.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IClientCallback Classes implementing this interface can be notified when the state of a Client changes.
IEntryGroupCallback Classes implementing this interface are notified when the state of an EntryGroup changes.
IRecordBrowserCallback Classes implementing this interface receive notifications from RecordBrowser objects when records for a given host have been retrieved.
IServiceBrowserCallback Objects implementing this interface can receive notifications from a ServiceBrowser about services matching a set of criteria (given to the service browser when instantiated).
IServiceResolverCallback Classes implementing this interface receive notifications from ServiceResolver objects when a service (as registered with the service resovler object) has been resolved.
 

Class Summary
Address This class encapsulate an IP address, either IPv4 or IPv6.
Avahi4JConstants This class contains a number of constants and enumerations used throughout Avahi4J.
Client This class is the entry point of Avahi4J.
EntryGroup An entry group is used to publish new services, and to update existing ones.
RecordBrowser Objects of this class are used to browse DNS records for a specific host.
ResolvedService This class encapsulates the details about a resolved service.
ServiceBrowser A service browser object can be used to look for services matching a given set of criteria.
ServiceResolver Objects of this class are used to resolve a service.
To create a service resolver object for a given service, call createServiceResolver() on an existing Client object.
 

Enum Summary
Avahi4JConstants.BrowserEvent This enumeration contains a list of possible browser events (either from ServiceBrowser or RecordBrowser).
Avahi4JConstants.DNS_Class This enumeration contains a list of possible DNS classes
Avahi4JConstants.DNS_RRType This enumeration contains a list of possible DNS Resource Record types.
Avahi4JConstants.Protocol This enumeration lists supported procotols.
Client.State This enumeration lists the possible states of a client.
EntryGroup.State This enumeration represents the various states an entry group can be in.
ServiceResolver.ServiceResolverEvent This enumeration lists the possible resolver events.
 

Package avahi4j Description

This is Avahi4J's main package which contains the classes to interact with Avahi.
